ARABIC: وَتَٱللَّهِ لَأَكِيدَنَّ أَصْنَٰمَكُم بَعْدَ أَن تُوَلُّوا۟ مُدْبِرِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: By Allah, I will devise some scheme against your idols when your backs are turned.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: I swear by God I will do something to your idols when you have turned your backs and gone."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: By Allah, I shall certainly carry out my plan against your gods after you are gone."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Abraham said to himself, "By God! I will devise a plan against their idols when they are away."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And, by oath of Allah, I shall seek to harm your idols after you have gone away and turned your backs.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And by Allah, I shall plot a plan for your idols after you have gone away and turned your backs."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And, by Allah! I will certainly do something against your idols after you go away, turning back.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And, by God, I shall assuredly outwit your idols, after you have gone away turning your backs.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And, by Allah, I shall circumvent your idols after ye have gone away and turned your backs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: By the Lord, I will devise a plan against your deities after you have gone away and turned your backs!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And by Allah I shall surely devise a plot against your idols after ye turned away backward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: By Allah, I will devise a stratagem against your idols after you have gone away.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And by Allah, I have a plan for your idols - after ye go away and turn your backs"..
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And by Allah, I shall plot a plan (to destroy) your idols after you have gone away and turned your backs."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: By Allah, I will certainly outwit your idols as soon as you have turned your backs and gone'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “By God, I will have a plan for your statues after you have gone away.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [I swear] by Allah, I will surely plan against your idols after you have turned and gone away."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [21:57] And, by God, I shall devise [a stratagem] against your idols after you have gone away, with your backs turned’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And, by Allah) he said this to himself, (I shall circumvent) I shall demolish (your idols after ye have gone away and turned your backs) to go to the festival.
